rooms.description: Spacious living area with Art Deco accents including geometric patterns and bold lines. Large windows for natural light.
Dedicated home office space with a desk, ergonomic chair and ample storage. Designed for productivity and natural light.
Home theater area integrated within the living space, featuring a projector screen and comfortable seating. Designed to maintain acoustics with natural lighting in adjacent areas.
Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor design. Easy access from the main entrance and adjacent to the living area.
Entryway that leads directly into the living area, designed to welcome natural light and incorporate Vastu principles.
Modern kitchen with ample natural light and ventilation, integrating Art Deco features and ergonomic layout.
Functional bathroom with natural ventilation, designed following Vastu guidelines for placement and lighting.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed with Art Deco elements and Vastu considerations.
Large window on the living area to maximize natural light and ventilation.
Office window ensuring ample natural light for productivity.
Garage door providing direct access to the two-car garage.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with Art Deco finishes, large windows for natural light and ventilation. Positioned according to Vastu principles.
Additional study space that can serve as a relaxation area or secondary work space, designed with natural light and ventilation in mind.
Storage room for extra furnishings or seasonal items, designed with Vastu principles and efficient space utilization.

openings.description: Windows in the upper floor to maximize natural light and enhance ventilation.
Staircase connecting ground floor and upper floor, designed for smooth transitions and safety.
